articles.author: Bill Hutchinson
articles.title: Detective and his family 'targeted' in 2 Molotov cocktail attacks: Sheriff
articles.description: A $10,000 reward is being offered in the case.
articles.content:
A $10,000 reward is being offered in the hunt for multiple people suspected of "targeting" a sheriff's homicide detective and his family in two terrifying Molotov cocktail attacks on his Texas home in less than a week, authorities said.

articles.description: Although Christmas may technically be over, the Disneyland Resort is still the Merriest Place on Earth for a few more days! Come and enjoy these “winter-ful” opportunities before they flurry away on Jan. 6:
articles.content:

articles.title: Disney VoluntEARS Create Holiday Magic Around the World
articles.description: Disney is committed to providing comfort, happiness, and inspiration to kids and families around the globe. This especially rings true during the holidays when Disney VoluntEARS participate in activities to help bring holiday joy to those in need.
